alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Island; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 9:48AM AKST until January 22 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW ACROSS THE CENTRAL PANHANDLE... .Snowfall rates are increasing across the central panhandle Sunday morning, causing the onset time of statements to begin earlier. This results in a longer duration snowfall and thus higher total accumulations. Dry snow will become wetter through the event with southern areas transitioning to rain. For northern areas, it is possible that snow lasts longer Monday night. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Storm total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Angoon and Kake. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to increase in water content through the duration of the event.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather.

area.areaDesc: Admiralty Island; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island
